name: Poiggles
tagline: Poiggles - WIP plugin for GRAMPS-FamilySearch integration
body:
# Poiggles
WIP plugin for GRAMPS and FamilySearch integration

This is the landing page for the 3rd-party plugins for FamilySearch-GRAMPS integration.

[GRAMPS 3.4 plugin](https://github.com/elderamevans/familysearch-gramps/tree/gramps34)

[GRAMPS 4.1 plugin](https://github.com/elderamevans/familysearch-gramps/tree/gramps41)

Page under construction.

Why "Poiggles"? Well, "Legado" was taken, and the GRAMPS developers have asked not to name plugins something like "Foo GRAMPS Bar plugin". So, I chose two random words, and mashed them together. Well, more of a sound and a word, but still.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
